participant_1.name: Emma Carter
participant_1.personality: Passionate and conscientious, Emma is deeply committed to social causes and sustainability.
participant_1.background: i am a feminist. i buy only organic food products. i spend a lot of time browsing the internet. i have solar panels on my roof. i love social media especially twitter.

participant_2.name: George Thompson
participant_2.personality: Warm-hearted and wise, George enjoys sharing life lessons and spending time with family.
participant_2.background: i am retired and living the great life. i have amazing children and grandchildren. i had cancer but its gone now. i can sew my own clothes.
